summary: Oregon's landmark bottle redemption law is under review due to concerns over its unintended social consequences, particularly related to drug use and homelessness.
Global stocks rally as investors anticipate a shift in monetary policy from major central banks, with hopes of interest rate cuts later this year.
A new AI model capable of generating realistic video from text prompts is raising concerns about misinformation and deepfakes.
The International Space Station (ISS) is preparing for a critical spacewalk to repair a damaged solar array, crucial for maintaining its power supply.
Negotiations for a ceasefire in the ongoing regional conflict have stalled, with both sides reportedly far from an agreement.
A breakthrough in fusion energy research promises a cleaner and more sustainable future, though commercial viability is still decades away.
The upcoming general election is seeing a surge in independent candidates, challenging the traditional two-party system.
Archaeologists have discovered a previously unknown ancient civilization in the Amazon rainforest, challenging existing theories about the region's history.
The film industry is grappling with the impact of streaming services on box office revenues and theatrical distribution models.
Major tech companies are investing heavily in quantum computing, aiming to solve problems currently intractable for classical computers.
